channel.title: Posts on Antire Valley Subdivision
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Antire Valley Subdivision

item.title: Annual Meeting July 13, 2025
item.description: From Nick Kuntz, Trustee of Antire Valley Subdivision: The Subdivision meeting is postponed to 3:00 July 13th so that we can mail proper notice and a proxy ballot for trustee. It will take place in the common ground at 3:00 pm Sunday, July 13, 2025.

item.title: Annual Meeting Postponed
item.description: From Bryan Urban, Trustee of Antire Valley Subdivision: The meeting that was scheduled for June 1 2025 has been postponed and a new date will be posted soon.

item.title: Planned Power Outage
item.description: From Tim Klos, Trustee of Antire Valley Subdivision: Antire Valley Residents: You may resume normal water usage at this time.

item.title: Planned Power Outage
item.description: From Tim Klos, Trustee of Antire Valley Subdivision: Antire Valley Residents: Since the electricity will be out starting at 8:00 AM tomorrow, Saturday, March 8, please limit water usage to essentials until power returns, water pressure has been restored, and an updated announcement has been posted. Amerent claims the outage will be approximately 2 hours for scheduled maintenance.

item.title: Public Notice -- Drinking Water
item.description:
Public Notice

Important information about your drinking water.

item.title: Letter To Antire Residents
item.description:
From Bryan Urban:

Water Well

As you all can see the well project is coming to an end. It must be said this project could not have been accomplished without the hard work of past and present trustees, their hard work has saved us a lot of money “thank you”. The cost came in around the $313,000 range.

item.title: Well Update
item.description:
From Nick Kuntz:

The new tank is now online and folks will have a smell and taste of chlorine for a short period.

item.title: Wood Available
item.description: There is free firewood in the common ground on Creekside Dr. The fallen trees have been cut and stacked.

item.title: 2024 Annual Subdivision Meeting Minutes
item.description: June 24, 2024 Antire Valley Subdivision Meeting Meeting was called to order by Scott Nelson Financial Report: main account has $137,024.80 road fund has $46,664.80 well construction fund is $168,951.62 well operating fund is $4,524.19 The Central bank loan for the alleys has a balance of $4,884.80 The Royal bank loan for the well has a balance of $86,612.26 Hopefully when the alley loan is paid off, the trustees can lower the assessment.

item.title: Water Quality Reports
item.description: Dear Residents, The latest water quality report for our community well is always available from the Missouri Department of Natural Resources at this link: Consumer Confidence Report This report is mandated by the government and is intended to give you information about the safety of our drinking water. We are licensed under the name “Antire Valley Subdivision”. Our Supply number is MO6036274. One can use this number to search for information on the MODNR site.
